title: Sweetbriar Summit
description: Hymn-singing spinster Regina Black was shocked to her virginal core. Imagine, Patrick Jones - North Magdalene's most notorious bachelor did - out to seduce her. She'd never permit it. Never. Not if hell froze over and Satan skate!Yet, in just on sultry afternoon on Sweetbriar Summit, virile Patrick jolted angelic Regina off the straight and narrow...and into the arms of temptation! And his surprising proposition of marriage was one she knew she couldn't refuse...
author: Christine Rimmer
